Package com.intellij.ui.scale

Class Scaler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.ui.scale.Scaler

  • public abstract class Scaler
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper over a user scale supplier, representing a state of a UI element in which its initial size is either pre-scaled (according to currentScale()) or not (given in a standard resolution, e.g. 16x16 for an icon).

      • scaleVal

        public double scaleVal(double value)
        Parameters:
        value - the value (e.g. a size of the associated UI object) to scale
        Returns:
        the scaled result, taking into account the pre-scaled state and currentScale()

      • currentScale

        protected abstract double currentScale()
        Supplies the Scaler with the current user scale. This can be the current global user scale or the context scale (UserScaleContext.usrScale) or something else.

      • update

        public boolean update(Scaler scaler)
        Synchronizes the state with the provided scaler.
        Returns:
        whether the state has been updated
